description: Ernesto "Che" Guevara, known as El Che or Che, was an Argentine Marxist revolutionary, diplomat, military theorist and guerrilla warfare leader and major figure in the Cuban Revolution. Even after his death, Guevara remains both a revered and reviled historical figure and his visage and name have become ubiquitous with counterculture and rebellion. Read all about him with this Che Guevara eBook.  It provides you with a truly remarkable account of his life including the revolution in Cuba.  Starting with his early life and education, the book goes on to chronicle his achievements and ends with an account of his legacy left after being assisinated and what it means in the context of capatalism.
